Deprecated Interfaces
org.cougaar.planning.plugin.legacy.ParameterizedPlugin
          We use introspection and the Component Model to find and call setParameter(Object) now instead of setParameters(Vector). 
 

Deprecated Classes
org.cougaar.planning.ldm.measure.AbstractRate
          Use a real Rate Measure instead 
org.cougaar.core.service.wp.Application
          see new AddressEntry factory method 
org.cougaar.core.servlet.BlackboardServlet
          use ServletPlugin. 
org.cougaar.core.node.ComponentMessage
          message to add/remove components, see AgentContainmentService. 
org.cougaar.core.mobility.plugin.MoveAgentPlugin
          replaced by the RedirectMovePlugin 
org.cougaar.core.node.NodeAgent
          see AgentImpl 
org.cougaar.core.node.NodeMessage
          unused Message base for nodes. 
org.cougaar.core.qos.metrics.ParameterizedPlugin
           
org.cougaar.util.ReadOnlyCollection
          Use java.util.Collections.unmodifiableCollection() method 
org.cougaar.util.ReadOnlySet
          Use java.util.Collections.unmodifiableSet() method 
org.cougaar.util.ReadOnlySortedSet
          Use java.util.Collections.unmodifiableSortedSet() method 
org.cougaar.core.agent.SimpleAgent
          see AgentImpl 
org.cougaar.planning.plugin.legacy.SimplifiedFatPlugin
          Use SimplePlugin and call chooseThreadingModel(SINGLE_THREAD) from your constructor. 
org.cougaar.planning.plugin.legacy.SimplifiedPlugin
          Use SimplePlugin: no modification needed. 
org.cougaar.planning.plugin.legacy.SingleThreadedPlugin
          Use SimplePlugin 
org.cougaar.planning.plugin.legacy.ThinPlugin
          Use SimplePlugin

Deprecated Constructors

          use "getAddressEntry(name, type, uri)"

org.cougaar.planning.ldm.plan.AllocationResult(double, boolean, AspectValue[], Enumeration)
          Use #AllocationResult(double, boolean, AspectValue[], Collection) instead. 
org.cougaar.planning.ldm.plan.AllocationResult(double, boolean, int[], double[])
          Use #AllocationResult(double,boolean,AspectValue[]) instead because AspectValues are not all describable by double values.

          Use #AllocationResult(double,boolean,AspectValue[],Collection) instead because AspectValues are not all describable by double values.

          Use AspectScorePoint(AspectValue,double) instead

          Why would you want a MessageAddress that only has attributes?

          Use java.util.Collections.unmodifiableCollection() method 
org.cougaar.util.ReadOnlySet(Set)
          Use java.util.Collections.unmodifiableSet() method 
org.cougaar.util.ReadOnlySortedSet(SortedSet)
          Use java.util.Collections.unmodifiableSortedSet() method 
org.cougaar.planning.ldm.plan.Role()
          Only to be used by Beans Introspection.

          Use toUID(String) or UID(String, long)
